attributes.action: deny Paris Hilton entry to the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paris Hilton is a 'socialite' and frequently breaks laws and disobeys judges.  Exposing her behavior to the UK population, especially children, would have a negative effect on peoples perception of what it is to be a good person.
We cannot allow the minds of our youth to be corrupted with this mis-aligned view of the world and how to conduct yourself in public.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
